content.code:
def precision_at_k(results, k):
    # 1 is relevant, 0 is not
    top_k = results[:k]
    return sum(top_k) / k

results = [1, 0, 1, 1, 0, 0, 0]
print(f"P@3: {precision_at_k(results, 3)}")
print(f"P@5: {precision_at_k(results, 5)}")
content.interpretation:
Interactive IR evaluation often focuses on the first few results.
Users rarely scroll past the first page (top 10).
High P@3 is more valuable for UX than high Recall across 1000 items.
